subtitle: Multiplayer Sudoku, No Ads
description:
Pure Quality Sudoku with real-time multiplayer racing and AI-powered learning. No ads, no subscriptions, no account required.

Challenge yourself with puzzles requiring advanced techniques, or race friends in real-time battles. Built-in AI hints guide you to master expert strategies like X-Wing and Swordfish.

• Pure Quality Sudoku
No ads, no subscriptions, no account required. Just pure, quality Sudoku puzzles designed for serious players.

• Advanced Learning with AI Hints
Challenge yourself with very hard puzzles requiring advanced techniques. Built-in AI-powered hints explain logic, highlight cells, and teach you expert strategies step-by-step.

• Real-Time Multiplayer Racing
Race against other players in real-time. Everyone plays the same board—first to finish wins. True competitive Sudoku. Compete side-by-side or remotely.

• All Skill Levels
Easy, medium, or hard puzzles. Perfect for beginners learning the basics or Sudoku masters tackling extreme challenges.

• Play Anywhere
Beautiful, intuitive interface optimised for iOS, Android, and web. Clean, modern design that lets you focus on the puzzle.

Clean, fast, and distraction-free. This is Sudoku done right.
whatsNew:
Updates in v1.0.13-1.0.16:

• Fixed Note Mode – Resolved bug where digit selection could cause accidental number placement when entering note mode.

• Improved Typography – Switched to EB Garamond font for better readability on game board and number pad.

• Enhanced Visibility – Improved cell highlight contrast: darker in light mode, lighter in dark mode for better visibility.

• UI Polish – Fixed number pad button text alignment for cleaner appearance.

• Fresh Icons – Updated app icons across all platforms for a modern look.

Plus all previous features: Web play, AI-powered learning, note-taking, and more.

No ads, no in-app purchases, no interruptions – just pure puzzle solving.
